website_summaries.verdict: If you do a lot of baking you will like the huge capacity on this fine mesh sifter.
pros: Much larger than others on the market
Also sifts sugars and other ingredients well
cons: This product's size may also make storage more difficult

customer_reviews.title: Didn't sift much at all
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty, and I was really looking forward to its size. But the rotary blades only grazed the wire mesh in one tiny spot. It took quite awhile to get it to sift the flour. I was doing a triple sifting of about 5 cups of flour. After the second sifting, I put it down and went back to my old sifter where the blades graze the wire mesh pretty much throughout. The old sifter was a lot faster. So I returned this one. This may have just been one bad one, but no matter how pretty and large, a sifter that doesn't sift well is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Rab

customer_reviews.title: The dimensions are slightly misleading.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sifter and it appears to be well built, but I don’t understand how they can advertise this 8-cup model has an 8” diameter. It is indeed 7” tall, but I was really hoping this truly did have an 8” diameter opening instead of 6”. Even the box says it’s 8. Seems as though they are including the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo Menconi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I generally sift large quantities at a time and am very pleased with the size, sturdiness and performance of this sifter. It let me work through my first batch in about 1 minute and performed perfectly. I would agree with one other reviewer that the handle design could be adjusted to be a bit more comfortable. But, don't let that change affect the strength of the handle or one's ability to control the sifter while being used. I am sure this is going to serve me well!
customer_reviews.author: Alan V

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the worst flour strainer i ever purchased... it doesn't work like it should, spinner is not even working
customer_reviews.author: ALICIA P GILLIARD

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: The holes in this are NOT fine enough. The size is great hence the reason why I kept it. Sifting powder sugar is ok. But I use my small strainer style sifter for flour. I can see the difference between both. I plan on getting it altered to switch out the mesh. Hopefully, it works, Otherwise from that, I would recommend it still because I know I can be anal about my baking equipment. You might be perfectly fine with the results.
customer_reviews.author: LYDIA

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I put in 3 cups of flour and turned the hand crank handle there was very little flour that came out. A flour sifter works a lot faster and a lot cheaper. I am really disappointed will not recommend it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W. Hensler

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The bars that are supposed to scrape against the mesh don't touch the mesh at all. I had to just shake it to sift. My mom had a hand crank sift like this when I was a kid. It worked really good and made sifting much faster and easier. This is not the case with this product. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Joubert

customer_reviews.title: Love this Sifter
customer_reviews.text: Love this Sifter! I make homemade fondant icing for cakes. The recipe requires lots of sifted powdered sugar. This Sifter is heavy duty and larger than a normal Sifter. It did the job perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: D. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: The body of the sifter is very strong, the sifting screen is very sturdy, and the crank and 'paddles' are high quality. I don't usually bake large batches of pastries, but this sifter is more than adequate to hold all the dry ingredients that I normally sift in preparation with room to spare. When turning the crank it is smooth and easy to use. I would readily recommend this device for anyone's kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Ok so far we will see.
customer_reviews.text: This already works better than the last POC multi level spring return sifter , don’t know if it will hold up that well but time will tell only used for 1 batch of pancakes so far will review in a couple of months after a few bags of flower has been used.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: This sifter looks nice and seems to be well made, but it doesn't work well. The rotating wires do not touch or scrape the sifting screen sufficiently to push the flour through. It takes "forever" to do any sifting with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "MUST HAVE"  Dependable Baking Tool
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy baking and find sifting flour with my ROYWEL Stainless Steel Rotary Hand Crank sifter with "8" cup capacity an "extremely efficient" unit. Strong handle and heavy duty whips making the chore of sifting a breeze. I am a disabled war vet and anything to make life a little better is always welcome, certainly this ROYWEL sifter helps me to be alittle more independent, too. Thank You, "God Bless America" Navy Davey, USN (ret)
customer_reviews.author: Davey Souther-Giancola

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Sifter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my niece who is a budding baker. She has only used it twice but so far so good. The item is nice and good quality. I think she will her many years of use with it.
customer_reviews.author: nora

customer_reviews.title: Great size, but worthless.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic size if you do a lot of sifting. However, the blades don't reach the mesh so, to borrow from a previous reviewer who summed it up perfectly: "no matter how pretty and large, a sifter that doesn't sift well is useless."
customer_reviews.author: T Li

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Vegan Baking daughter, The Vegan Chick. She loves this. The size is perfect for her vegan cakes, cookies etc. Sifts to her liking. Glad I gave to her
customer_reviews.author: Debra C

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Sifter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter in law for our beach trip. She absolutely loves it! She couldn't say enough good compliments about her new sifter!
customer_reviews.author: Princess Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Good size sifter, but gets stuck easily
customer_reviews.text: Note: I use this mainly for roasting coffee, and it gets stuck often. Wish it was a bit more sturdy. I imagine with a lot of flour it would do the same.
customer_reviews.author: vlotty

customer_reviews.title: great for sifting a large amount of flour
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for an elderly aunt when she realized there was an easy way to sift flour for her massive batches of cookies and breads. The rotary action is easy both for someone with weaker wrists or arthritis, as well as for quickly moving through large amounts of flour.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sturzenacker

customer_reviews.title: Nob fell off
customer_reviews.text: The nob on the handle fell off. It still works but you have to hold just the metal part.
customer_reviews.author: JJJJJJJJJ :-)

customer_reviews.title: Sift your heart out
customer_reviews.text: Lovely size. My previous shifter onky held 2 cups and it was too small, this one is lovely and large.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Was OK but not fine enough
customer_reviews.text: Had to pick up holes in the flower didn’t get all the way out there was a lot of buildup on the walls
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Its good.
customer_reviews.text: Its just a bit tricky to dry after you washed but its realy nice.
customer_reviews.author: luis hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Last for ever equipment.
customer_reviews.text: My wife love it compared to some of the others she purchased over forty six years.
customer_reviews.author: j.duncan

customer_reviews.title: Big ol’ sifter
customer_reviews.text: This baby is wonderful. Holds enough you only fill it once.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Arnn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t sift!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it has good capacity. But the only way to move your large quantity of flour or confectioners sugar or whatever out of the sifter is to bang the side — the rotating wires don’t do a thing but stir. It appears they are too far away from the screen. Poorly designed and useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte M.

customer_reviews.title: It’s GIANT !
customer_reviews.text: This sifter is giant! Not your grandmothers sifter that’s for sure! Was very surprised at the size! It stands next to my iPad Pro 12.9. Large capacity. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sifting bran out of fresh milled flour
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to sift the bran out of freshly milled flour. It did not work. The holes in the mesh are too big. We need a finer mesh to pull out the unwanted bran.

customer_reviews.title: The sifter is perfect. The size
customer_reviews.text: The sifter is perfect. The size, the quality couldn't be better. Speedy arrival, safely packaged. Now I am ready to start baking! Thank you. Janet lancaster
customer_reviews.author: Janet Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for persons that have carpal tunnel.
customer_reviews.text: The most important thing to me is I don’t have to squeeze the handle to sift. That’s why I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for $3.13. It's fabulous. My hand doesn't get cramped. Even though it's a 8 cup, I only put 2 cup max at a time.
customer_reviews.author: cegray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, sifts very well,
customer_reviews.text: This is so much easier than the squeeze type, easier on my hands. very good sifting, does not clog up.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted a large capacity flour sifter and this is it. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Flour Sifter Deluxe
customer_reviews.text: This machine is hearty and durable, heavy duty, This is my second one, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Solid flour sifter
customer_reviews.text: Really well made. The sweepers and the axle can be removed for more intense cleaning. I’ve been using it as the body for a coffee roasting rig rather than as a proper flour sifter. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Evan S

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Lock nut holding handle on seems to small, handle is not steady. The washer is also missing on one side. Total junk! Shifter is made cheap, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks durable
customer_reviews.text: The sifter is a nice size and easy to handle. The curved in bottom is nice because it keeps the sugar or flour from dusting out too far. The only issue that kept me from giving it 5 stars is that the rotating bars don't touch the screen in all areas. I have flour/sugar at the bottom and sides of the screen and have to tap the sides to get it to go through.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: This sifter does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: The mesh is not fine but more importantly the rotating band does not fit, does not reach the bottom and almost no flour is sifted. Does not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: susan  holland

customer_reviews.title: Great overall product. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The only thing is that the spinner doesn't fully touch the bottom. The capacity is amazing! Super easy to clean. Great for bigger jobs!
customer_reviews.author: aletta

customer_reviews.title: flour sifter
customer_reviews.text: It works very well--and fast. I enjoy the larger size because you can put as much flour in there as you like.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bertoncelj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sifter.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I have used for a lot of baking other goodies for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not made for Almond Flour
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I got tired of sifting almond flour with a shaker sifter. I figured this would be easier and faster. The almond flour won't even sift through it. So I just wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this the size is perfect when doubling recipes. One and done is my motto. When highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: bh

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! Easy on hands , help prevent Carpal Tunnel in hands!!
customer_reviews.text: Best sifter I’ve ever used!! Able to handle 7 cups of flour with ease!! Made well as well!!

customer_reviews.title: Good for large recipes - breads, etc
customer_reviews.text: I like that it holds so much more than standard sifters

customer_reviews.title: Great Size
customer_reviews.text: Great I have been searching for a larger cup Sifter for years. The only issue I wish it had a lid...
customer_reviews.author: LiViTech Double Layer Hard Case for HTC Desire HD / Inspire 4G orange / White

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and easy to use right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Wissler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sifter to replace the one that had the trigger type handle. Much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sifter!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sifter. I use to dread baking at the holidays. I now don't this softer has made sifting so easy
customer_reviews.author: Mary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best large shifter.  Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love it . Being a baker it really helps that I can add a large quantity of flour and sift with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This sift is just what my mom use to use.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this yo can get all your ingredients in at one time.Its great

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and big enough to do a hole 5lb cut in half

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I recently received a sugar sifter after wanting one for a long time and it has been fabulous very easy to use and easy to clean as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8 cups is very BIG!
customer_reviews.text: I wish, I bought 5 cups one. The 8 cups is way to big! Wanted to return and buy 5 cups instead, but the shipping cost is $ 6 :( So keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Great sifter
customer_reviews.text: Nice to be able to get a larger sifter. Arrived promptly. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Heavy construction
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than expected. Heavy construction with multiple shifting blades
customer_reviews.author: nancy ohrmundt

customer_reviews.title: Works fast
customer_reviews.text: I Absolutely love my new sifter I purchased two 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This sifter doesn't sift worth a flip. My mother-in-law used it to begin with, and she said she liked it, but when I used it recently I completely disagree. It takes forever for the flour to go completely through the sifter, and when you get about half way down you have to start banging the sifter on something because the turn thing won't work the flour through anymore. Total waste of money, if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: L.F.

customer_reviews.title: It is ok but not much more than that
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit bulky to hold. The handle is so wide after a few minutes my hand starts to ache and I have to rest. I bought this to specifically sift powdered sugar and it does just ok. It will not sift 100% of the sugar so I end up throwing away product each time. It also is so slow! I don't have a lot of time to spend on sifting sugar so it is frustrating. I will use it until I find a better option and then off to the donating facility it goes.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Not only is this a great, huge sifter
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this a great, huge sifter, the sifting apparatus is just far enough removed from the grate that it doesn't smoosh larger particles through. Makes for a very fine sifting experience that combines the best aspects of a sifter and a classic sieve.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be tweaked, and beware of the “shelf”
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this works pretty well - a bigger version of the variety my mom used when I was a kid. I had to adjust/tweak the screen so that the mechanism that presses what you’re sifting would actually make contact. Also, there is a “shelf” on the bottom that the freshly sifted product gets stuck on, so you need to make sure you shake it off into your bowl to ensure the entire volume is included into what you’re making.
customer_reviews.author: Erika H

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: So far it works good. I have a small low carb bakery business and need a sifter for every batch of muffins I make. The only thing I don't like is the handle is too think for my hand, makes it hard to hold onto and grasp. Digs into my hand since it's so wide, so I have to either wrap silicone around it or wrap a towel around it. The crank is a little stiff but that's too be expected since it's brand new, hoping it will loosen up as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: KTracy34

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: This product came dirty! So sad I couldn’t use it! I had to send it back
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Dose not work
customer_reviews.text: The wire that spins is suppose to go against the screen to sift flour poorly made dose not touch it. The only way to sift flour is to bang the side of it. The spinning handle does nothing
customer_reviews.author: red kat

customer_reviews.title: Great as coffee roaster
customer_reviews.text: Great for turning into a coffee roaster Made a set of paddles and mounted them on a new 1/4"axle hooked up to a cordless drill driver
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Beuchert

customer_reviews.title: Large sifter
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to have a large sifter to use. However this one didn't work for me and I returned it. The wire did not touch the screen tight enough to push the flour through. The outer portion of the sifter is very sturdy. I would have loved it had it worked correctly.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Super suprised... Awesome rotary sifter
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Sturdy construction and excellent materials make this a a awesome product. I bought the larger 8 cup version and we really are satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Reach_Medic

customer_reviews.title: Flour Sifter 8 Cup Baking Tool - Rotary Hand...
customer_reviews.text: My third sifter in 52 years! It's great, works well and processes 8 cups of flour at a time. It's stainless steel so it should last a long time. It will last longer then I will.
customer_reviews.author: Linda v.

customer_reviews.title: wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: looks nice and i like the size, but the rotary blades barely reach the mesh so i am constantly tapping it to get the powdered sugar in a spot where the blade will reach.
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: IT Works
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a sifter that we have had since 1962. A perfect replacement and it does work to sift the whole wheat flour I grind myself. Great product and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Norm springfield

customer_reviews.title: And he loved that it was stainless steel so that it won't ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this from my husband because he loves to bake. He loves it because sometimes his hands hurt and he doesn't have to press back and forth because it's a sifter with a handle that turns. And he loved that it was stainless steel so that it won't rust.

customer_reviews.text: 3rd one for me, gave 2 sisters, nieces and friends

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and durable and it looks great. I like the how easy this product is to use even when it's full.

customer_reviews.text: This size is perfect for any baking job big or little. Love it

customer_reviews.title: It takes forever to sift powder sugar (my last sifter ...
customer_reviews.text: It takes forever to sift powder sugar (my last sifter broke but did this work much quicker). Also the curve at the bottom hold your product in the sifter instead of going into the bowl. You have to turn upside down and sideways to get everything out.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality sifter. I don't use it for flour or even in the kitchen for that matter. I use to sift chemicals for fireworks and it does a fantastic job. I see absolutely no reason why it wouldn't be any better in the kitchen.

product_meta.title: Flour Sifter 8 Cup Stainless Steel Rotary Hand Crank, Baking Sugar Sifter with 16 Fine Mesh Screen, Corrosion Resistant - Bake & Decorate Cakes, Pies, Pastries, Cupcakes
feature_bullets: 🍰 VERSATILE: This ChefGiant Hand Crank Flour Sifter will break up clumps and aerate flour, sugar, and other baking ingredients to give your baked goods a light and fluffy texture. Just add ingredients, turn the crank, and the result is a light, even, fine powder! Essential for cakes with a very light, delicate texture. Also perfect for flouring your work surface or giving food a light dusting of powdered sugar.

🍰 DURABLE STAINLESS STEEL CONSTRUCTION: This baking flour sifter is made of premium corrosion resistant stainless steel with a highly polished body. Unlike plastic and wood, stainless steel does not absorb bacteria or smells ensuring everlasting lifespan. The beater is chrome plated with wire reinforcement on the bottom.

🍰 ROTARY HAND CRANK DESIGN: Squeeze handles are hard to work with and require strength, which means they can wear you out quickly. This flour sifters rotary hand crank design operates smoothly and effortlessly, it can stand up to repeated use without tiring out your hand.

🍰 FINE MESH SIFTER: The 16 fine mesh screen has a smaller weave and holes for sifting finer ingredients. It will make the flour easier to incorporate and result in a lighter, more consistent product. It will also remove any unwanted lumps to create a final professional-tasting product every time.

🍰 COMPACT 8 CUP SIFTER: Capable of holding up to 8 cups of flour, this flour sifter will save you time during busy times in your bakery or home kitchen. The 8” diameter x 7” high size is space-saving, while still allowing for high volume use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars374 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
